articles.title: NASA cancels a multibillion-dollar satellite servicing demo mission - Ars Technica
articles.description: Congress kept throwing money at the OSAM-1 mission, but it faced continual delays.

articles.title: Sustainable Chemistry Achieved: Scientists Develop Organic Framework Material That Mimics Photosynthesis - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists at the National University of Singapore (NUS) have created a microporous covalent organic framework with dense donor–acceptor lattices and engineered linkages for the efficient and clean production of hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) through the photosynth…
articles.content: Scientists have developed a new photocatalytic method for producing hydrogen peroxide using water and air, employing a novel covalent organic framework. This method is energy-efficient and environmen… [+3704 chars]
